leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of bug-like chitin quickly cover [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As the chitin spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, they morphs into claws. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new chitin smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldHyena(bug-like legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into bug-like feets, with claws on the end.
